entry.tran: 品貌兼优的；英俊潇洒的
entry.def: Someone who is personable has a pleasant appearance and character.

example.ex: The people I met were intelligent, mature, personable.
example.tran: 我见到的是一些聪明、成熟、品貌兼优的人。

means.word_mean: 1. (of persons) pleasant in appearance and personality
